page.title: 08Childrens Games in Salterton
page.content: The following games for children are the most popular in Budleigh Salterton. {CHASE }Two teams of four people make a place for jail. This could be a post.One team runs off and the other team counts to twenty and then chases them.Anyone caught is taken to jail.They can be freed by being touched.The game is over when the whole team is in jail. {MONKEY}The catcher counts to fifty at the post while the rest hide.When the catcher sees someone he touches the post and calls Monkey One Two Three and Out.If the other gets to the post first they shout Monkey One Two Three and In. {CONKERS }Two horse chestnuts are threaded on string.One person holds his conker while the other hits it. They take turns until one smashes.
